index.tagline: ค้นหา เล่นและสร้างม็อดมายคราฟ
index.description: Find enjoyable and quality content through our open-source modding platform built for the community. Create stuff, get paid*, and deploy your project with our fully documented API!

book.title: API ใช้ง่าย
book.description: Backed by a fully documented API facilitating the growth of 3rd party integrations & launchers.

coin.title: รายได้ครีเอเตอร์
coin.description: Planning to give creators 100% of ad revenue from their project pages. *Payouts are currently in development.

speedometer.title: Lightning-fast search
speedometer.description: Powered by fast and adaptable search algorithms so you don't have to wait.

chat.title: Helpful community
chat.description: Get support, develop, and hang out on our Discord server with over 1,500 members.

puzzle.title: Extensible by design
puzzle.description: Integrates with build tools, repositories, launchers, and custom applications.

tools.title: Fully open source
tools.description: An open source project maintained by an active community that welcomes contributions.

delete.title: ลบบัญชี
delete.body: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Deleting your account will remove all attached data, including projects, from our servers.

auth.title: Authorization token
auth.body: Your authorization token can be used with the Modrinth API, the Minotaur Gradle plugin, and other applications that interact with Modrinth's API. Be sure to keep this secret!

revoke_token.title: Revoke your Modrinth token
revoke_token.body:
Revoking your Modrinth token can have unintended consequences. Please be aware that the following could break:
 - Any application that uses your token to access the API.
 - Gradle - if Minotaur is given a incorrect token, your Gradle builds could fail.
 - GitHub - if you use a GitHub action that uses the Modrinth API, it will cause errors.

If you are willing to continue, complete the following steps:

 1. Head to the [Modrinth Application page on GitHub](https://github.com/settings/connections/applications/3acffb2e808d16d4b226). Make sure to be logged into the GitHub account you used for Modrinth!
 2. Press the big red "Revoke Access" button next to the "Permissions" header.

Once you have completed those steps, press the "Log out" button below.

**This will log you out of Modrinth, however, when you log back in, your token will be regenerated.**
revoke_token.action: ออกจากระบบ

ads.privacy_respecting: A privacy-respecting ad would have been shown here.

console.line2: Your adblocker prevented Modrinth from showing an ad, our only source of income.
console.line3: If you still want to help Modrinth without viewing ads, you can contribute to Modrinth on GitHub!

project.title: Delete project
project.description: Deleting a project erases all project data, including versions.

version.title: Delete version
version.description: Are you sure you want to delete this version? All files and metadata will be irrecoverably lost.

account.title: Are you sure you want to do this?
account.description:
This will **immediately delete all of your projects** and follows. Deleting your account cannot be reversed.

If you need help with your account, get support on the [Modrinth Discord](/discord).

image.title: Delete gallery image
image.description: Are you sure you want to delete this image file and metadata? This action cannot be undone.

generic.description: Modding should be safe for everyone, so we take abuse and malicious intent seriously at Modrinth. We want to hear about harmful content on the site that violates our [ToS](/legal/terms) and [Rules](/legal/rules). Rest assured, we’ll keep your identifying information private.

information.label: Additional information
information.helper: Include links and images if possible. Markdown formatting is supported.

project.title: Create project
project.description: New projects are created as drafts, and can be found under your profile page.
